subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: David West scored 16 points, George Hill added 15 and the Indiana Pacers took home-court advantage away from Miami by beating the Heat in Game 2 of the teams’ Eastern Conference semifinal series Tuesday night.
snippet: David West scored 16 points, George Hill added 15 and the Indiana Pacers took home-court advantage away from Miami by beating the Heat in Game 2 of the teams’ Eastern Conference semifinal series Tuesday night.
